quark.gui.config.subheader2: Consider supporting us on Patreon for cool in-game rewards like this!
quark.jei.hint.flamerang: Works like a Pickarang, but any items it picks up become immune to Fire and Lava damage while they travel.
quark.jei.hint.blackstone_furnace: If the block under this Furnace produces Soul Fire when lit, the furnace will too.
quark.jei.hint.iron_rod: Will break any blocks in front of it when pushed with a Piston.
quark.jei.hint.jasper: Can be found in big clusters in Mesas and Deserts.
quark.jei.hint.limestone: Can be found in big clusters in Swamps and Oceans.
quark.jei.hint.myalite: Can be found in big clusters in the outer End Highlands. It reacts to an invisible field in the world, changing colour depending on where it's placed with the field's intensity.
quark.jei.hint.ancient_tome: Can upgrade an item or book's enchantment by one level, up to one above the normal cap. Rarely found in Dungeons or Strongholds.
quark.jei.hint.stools: Can be sat on, and stay sat on when moved by a Piston. Placing a block on top will change the Stool to a table.
quark.jei.hint.wool_muffling: Can be used to silence Minecarts if placed under the rail.
quark.jei.hint.smithing_template_rune: Combine in a Smithing Table with an enchanted item to change its shine colour. This is purely visual.
quark.jei.hint.item_frame_dyeing: Can be dyed the same way you'd dye leather armour.
quark.jei.hint.corundum: Can be found underground in large clusters of two colours each. Will slowly grow upwards if placed deep underground. Can be waxed to prevent growth and particle emission.
quark.jei.hint.crystal_lamp: These lamps will only change the colour of a beacon beam when turned on.
quark.jei.hint.use_for_binding: A Player Head with Curse of Binding on it can be put on an Armour Stand to display that player's full body.
quark.jei.hint.matrix_influencing: Candles may also be used to increase the odds of specific enchantments. If the Candle has Soul Sand below it or below the Bookshelf it's on, it will decrease those odds instead.
quark.jei.hint.shiba_find_low_light: If you're holding a Torch, Shibas will point out dark spots for you to light up.
quark.jei.hint.minecraft.calcite: Additional large Calcite clusters are added to mountains.
quark.jei.hint.minecraft.lava_bucket: Right click an item in your inventory onto the Lava Bucket to destroy it forever! Shulker Boxes and items that are immune to fire such as Netherite cannot be destroyed this way.
block.quark.light_gray_shingles_vertical: Light Grey Terracotta Shingle Vertical Slab
block.quark.waxed_oxidized_cut_copper_ve: Waxed Oxidised Cut Copper Vertical Slab
advancements.quark.wear_full_rainbow.des: Wear a full set of armour with Rainbow Runes applied
advancements.quark.get_all_corundum.desc: Get every colour of Corundum Cluster
